properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 8:29PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Accumulating Snowfall Tonight through Tuesday...

* WHAT...A wintry mix is expected, but snow will be the main
precipitation type. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
with locally higher amounts possible.

* WHERE...Portions of South Central Kansas.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions may occur and could impact
the morning and evening commutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A thin glaze of ice on elevated surfaces,
from freezing rain is possible late tonight, but the freezing
rain will quickly change over to all snow by sunrise Tuesday.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY
